synopsis.text: In the futuristic Kingdom of Fir antic, two royal houses vie for control of the throne. According to legend, whoever retrieves the mythical Firebird will become the rightful ruler. Princess Sara, descendant of modern-day detectives Paul and Tracy, travels back in time seeking the Firebird. Using her psychic abilities, she informs Paul and Tracy of their family connection and enlists their help. Though initially stunned, the duo eagerly agree to aid their future princess. They soon learn Princess Miranda, Sara's rival, has also come to the present day pursuing the Firebird. After tracking Miranda's time machine, Paul, Tracy, and Sara give chase, hoping Miranda holds the key to finding the Firebird and securing the kingdom for Sara's bloodline. What follows is a thrilling race against time, with the future of the Kingdom of Fir antic hanging in the balance. Will Sara and her ancestors triumph over Miranda? Or will Miranda procure the mythical Firebird and seize the Fir antic throne?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
